sub_fields.label: Full Width Content?
sub_fields.name: full_width_content
sub_fields.message: If you enable this feature, the content row will stretch full screen no matter how wide the viewing screen is.

sub_fields.label: Columns
sub_fields.name: columns
sub_fields.instructions: You've already created a Section. Now, fill it up with content, column by column. If you just want one column, select Full Width. If you'd like 3 columns, for example, create 3 columns with 1/3 width.
sub_fields.button_label: Add A Column To This Section

sub_fields.label: Center Column?
sub_fields.name: center_column
sub_fields.message: Tick this box if you would like, for example, one column at 50% width, centered.

sub_fields.label: Background Image
sub_fields.name: background_image
sub_fields.instructions: This image will be cropped down to 940 x 470.

sub_fields.label: Pop Up Mode
sub_fields.name: pop_up_mode
sub_fields.instructions: If this is set to true the team members will open in a pop up window rather than having their own page. If this is set to false, each team member will have their own page with their info displayed there.

sub_fields.label: Pop Up Mode
sub_fields.name: pop_up_mode
sub_fields.instructions: If this is set to true the events will open in a pop up window rather than having their own page. If this is set to false, each event will have its own page with their info displayed there.

sub_fields.label: Slideshow Mode
sub_fields.name: slideshow_mode
sub_fields.instructions: If slideshow mode is turned on, multiple testimonials will show in a slideshow. If not, a single testimonial will display.

sub_fields.label: Choose Testimonials
sub_fields.name: choose_testimonials
sub_fields.instructions: You can select specific testimonials to display. If you do not select any specific ones the module will show random testimonials, different on every page load.

sub_fields.label: Choose Testimonial
sub_fields.name: choose_testimonial
sub_fields.instructions: You can select a specific testimonial to display. If you do not select a specific one the module will show a random testimonial, different on every page load.

sub_fields.label: Slides
sub_fields.name: slides
sub_fields.instructions: If your Mainstage Area includes the option for a slideshow then you will be able to add multiple slides here. If not, the maximum number of slides you can add will be 1.

sub_fields.label: Buttons
sub_fields.name: buttons
sub_fields.instructions: If your website doesn't support multiple buttons then you will only be able to add a maximum of 1.
